channel.title: Metal gear?
channel.description:
Well you probably all know i'm a metal gear nut so its no surprise that i love the metal gear theme song, which is probably why i cum buckets (YES A 4CHAN MEME AHHHHHH) everytime i see this performed live.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8j_iAlsLo9k of course, not forgetting the tradition mgs humour. Proper recorded version: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ECjDfQd8QVc&feature=related: Live version seems much more powerful though.
(Another performance, much better: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZfKA4b5SFq4&feature=related )
Don't ask me why i've all of a sudden rekindled my love for the mgs soundtrack, probably just me playing through mgs4 again and listening to the soundtrack i got with the limited edition again.

item.title: Metal gear?
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

S&M is an awesome example of classical instruments being used to play popular songs with young adults and teens today. I don’t like this song all that much, but I love listening to it while playing though.

Read full topic

instruments sound cooler sometimes.

I like it
